name: Die Hard
entries: Your grit and tenacity keep you on your feet when others would fall.

items: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on death saving throws.
When you are at 0 hit points and regain hit points, you can spend one Hit Die, roll it, and regain additional hit points equal to the number rolled + your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1).
Effects that would drop you to 1 hit point instead of 0 do not trigger this feat's final benefit.
